title: Yemen Peace Talks To Begin Monday
teaser: NPR's Arun Rath talks to journalist Safa Al Ahmad about her time embedded with Houthi rebels in Yemen and the situation on the ground on the eve of Monday's U.N. peace talks in Geneva. Nearly 2000 Yemeni civilians have died in fighting since March.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
